title: mother fucking dcing
body: all i in the title lads all in the title

replies.body:
Had a matchmaking experience happen where the game didn't put me in champ select, it kicked me out, but the friend i was queuing said that I will still in it. So I press play a minute later and somehow end up in matchmaking with the "misconnection" icon. Everyone was not picking a champion and to test if I could I clicked on Soraka, the icon didn't go away.
The timer ends with no one picking a champion, the number timer was gone but i was still in the champ select. I decide to force quite League through the program bar down the bottom and restart the client. I log in an it says that I'm in a game. I'm really confused so I question my friend who I was queuing with and he says that I picked Soraka and am DC.
I pressed reconnect (even though I never connected to the game) and wait for the loading screen to get me to the match. This time I'm stuck at the loading screen. Ping was moving between 100 - 110 so that was fine, but it said 100%. So I wait a minute more and nothing else has happened.
So for the second time I restart the client and reconnect and within 10 seconds I'm in the match.
11 minutes had passed and it was a 3v5. 
Somehow we won by a landslide and I didn't even have the right runes and masteries. I had my top AD Quinn masteries and runes... and I've never really played Soraka besides once in a custom made match.

P.S. Her heals are OP, wtf.

> [{quoted}](name=kJs,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=NfzYvUNm,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-01T11:41:15.517+0000)

> Had a matchmaking experience happen where the game didn't put me in champ select, it kicked me out, but the friend i was queuing said that I will still in it. I decide to force quite League through the program bar down the bottom and restart the client. I log in an it says that I'm in a game. > So for the second time I restart the client and reconnect and within 10 seconds I'm in the match.
> 11 minutes had passed and it was a 3v5. 
> Somehow we won by a landslide and I didn't even have the right runes and masteries. I had my top AD Quinn masteries and runes... and I've never really played Soraka besides once in a custom made match.
> 
> P.S. Her heals are OP, wtf.

Why re-post this, are you TRYING to gain, ahem _traction_????
I posted this one first. I thought my experience was relevant but when I went to the other thread I thought it was more relevant there.
Didn't know we were writing essays.
I'm bad at Essays. I always get between 40 to 60%
